pkgmetadata.longdescription: # 2048## What is this?It's 2048, written in Python by the Ladue High School Computer Science Club. It's still in its early stages, so expect bugs!## Getting started### Download and runDownload or clone this repo, then run `python3 main.py`.If Python complains about `termcolor`, install it with `pip install termcolor`.### Run onlineRun it online on [Repl.it](https://repl.it/@Ta180m/2048#main.py).### Install using `pip`Install with `pip install 2048-py`.Run `2048-py` to play the game.### Get it from the AUROn Arch Linux, get the `2048-py` package from the AUR.Run `2048-py` to play the game.
